InsertCatagory: Insert into Catagory(ParentCatagoryUid, CatagoryName, Description, AddedOn, UpdateOn, CGST, SGST, IGST, CreatedBy, ModifiedBy) Values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
InsertNewCustomer: Insert into Customer(FirstName, LastName, Gender, MobileNo, AlternetMobileNo, ShopPhoneNumber, EmailId, ShopName, FullAddress, LicenseNo, GSTNo, State, City, Pincode, SiteUrl, ImagePath ,IsPremium, CreatedOn, UpdatedOn, CreatedBy, UpdatedBy, IsClient) Values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
UpdateCustomer: UPDATE Customer Set FirstName = ?, LastName = ?, Gender = ?, MobileNo = ?, AlternetMobileNo = ?, ShopPhoneNumber = ?, EmailId = ?, ShopName = ?, FullAddress = ?, LicenseNo = ?, GSTNo = ?, State = ?, City = ?, Pincode = ?, SiteUrl = ?, ImagePath = ?, IsPremium = ?, UpdatedOn = ?, UpdatedBy = ? Where CustomerUid = ?;
SelectCustomerCount: SELECT Count(1) as total FROM Customer where ?
SelectStocksCount: SELECT Count(1) as total FROM Stocks where ?
SelectLogin: Select * from login where Username = '?' and password = '?';
GetLastSequenceKey: Select seq from sqlite_sequence where name=?;
InsertNewBrand: Insert into ItemBrands(BrandName, Description, CatagoryUid, AddedOn, UpdatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedBy) Values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
InsertNewStock: Insert into Stocks(StockParentUid, ItemName, BrandUid, SerialNumber, CatagoryUid, Quantity, AvailableQuantity, ActualPrice, SellingPrice, MRP, Discount, ExpiredOn, AddedOn, ModifiedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedBy, VendorUid) Values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
UpdateStock: Update Stocks Set BrandUid = ?, SerialNumber = '?', CatagoryUid = ?, Quantity = ?, AvailableQuantity = ?, ActualPrice = ?, SellingPrice = ?, MRP = ?, Discount = ?, ExpiredOn = '?', ModifiedOn = '?', ModifiedBy = ?, VendorUid = ? where StockUid = ?;
